casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Anthony Bernard BOWDEN No. 232P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, Paul M. Green, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Bowden, Anthony Bernard. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General. Brian D. Rabinovitz, Assistant Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of July 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
